word: Of one purpose only were they conscious. One presence filled their thought. They exclaimed, "Rabbi, . . . where dwellest thou?" In a brief interview by the wayside they could not receive that for which they longed. They desired to be alone with Jesus, to sit at His feet, and hear His words. "He saith unto them, Come and see. They came and saw where he dwelt, and abode with him that day."
